rules_text:
Destroy target creature or Vehicle.
If your life total is greater than half your starting life total, surveil 2. Otherwise you may put a creature or artifact card from your graveyard on top of your library. [i](To surveil 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)[/i]
notes:
